person.persName: Isaac Rhodus (Madison County and Estill County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Madison County and Estill County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married Patsy Todd in Madison County on March 10, 1831. Father of Lucinda J. Rhodus, Albert Rhodus, Sally A. Rhodus, Thomas Rhodus, James Rhodus, William Rhodus, Louisa Rhodus, Martha F. Rhodus, and Cassandre Rhodus. Married Lucy Turpin in Madison County on June 10, 1862. Farmer in Estill County in 1850. Signed letter to Governor Beriah Magoffin on March 11, 1861 stating intention to serve in a militia company from Richmond, Kentucky.
